Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Stone Moon focuses on providing storage solutions and advancing the Filecoin ecosystem. We've onboarded various storage providers and infrastructure services to support fair data storage and retrieval. By collaborating with ecosystem builders, we've pushed Filecoin's growth. Through partnerships with data providers, app developers, and blockchain experts, we've expanded our services to meet market demands. We've strengthened ties with storage providers and developed relationships with FVM smart contract app developers to drive innovative Filecoin tech uses. We're constantly scouting for new useful data to enhance user options for data storage.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
--The latest and final infrared spectra of the SDSS component Apache Point Observatory Galaxy Evolution Experiment 2 (APOGEE-2), as well as abundance measurements and radial velocities
--The latest and final data cubes from integral field unit (IFU) spectroscopic observations of nearby galaxies from the SDSS component Mapping Nearby Galaxies at APO (MaNGA), as well as the final data products and maps from the MaNGA Data Analysis Pipeline (DAP)
--The latest and final optical stellar spectra of the MaNGA Stellar Library program (MaStar)
--The latest and final data release of optical spectra from the SDSS component extended Baryon Oscillation Spectroscopic Survey (eBOSS), including the spectra of the SPectroscopic IDentfication of ERosita Sources (SPIDERS) survey and Time Domain Spectroscopic Survey (TDSS).
--Value Added Catalogs (VACs) for all three SDSS components (eBOSS, APOGEE-2 and MaNGA), including targeting catalogs
--The most current reprocessed imaging and spectra from the SDSS legacy survey
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, Africa, North America, South America, Europe, Australia (continent), Antarctica
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: Cloud storage (i.e. S3), HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives
